item.title: Sukumar sidelines Pushpa 3 as of now - 123telugu
item.description:
Sukumar sidelines Pushpa 3 as of now

Published on Jan 4, 2025 2:00 pm IST

The celebrated director Sukumar has decided to temporarily put the plans for Pushpa 3 on hold while he focuses on other projects and personal matters.

  • Pushpa 2 has received a warm reception, significantly boosting Allu Arjun's popularity.
  • Sukumar is currently enjoying a break in the US and working on a new project with Ram Charan.
  • He has expressed a desire not to rush the production of Pushpa 3.
  • There is speculation that production for Pushpa 3 may not start until 2027.
"Sukumar has endured significant stress over the past year and a half and deserves a break."

Fans of the franchise may need to adjust their expectations regarding the release timeline for Pushpa 3.

item.title: JDJ 11 Fame Dhanashree Verma And Yuzvendra Chahal Headed For Divorce - Report - Times Now
item.description:
Dhanashree Verma and Yuzvendra Chahal Facing Divorce - Report

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times Now

The marriage between cricketer Yuzvendra Chahal and choreographer Dhanashree Verma may be coming to an end as rumors of a split circulate. Insiders report that divorce proceedings are likely unavoidable, although not yet finalized.

  • Insiders confirm rumors of their separation are true.
  • The couple has unfollowed each other on Instagram and deleted photos of their marriage.
  • Fans express shock and sadness, hoping for reconciliation.
  • The couple married in December 2020 and were previously viewed as a perfect couple.
  • Chahal supported Verma on a dance reality show earlier this year.
The divorce is inevitable, and it's only a matter of time before it becomes official.

As public speculation grows, the fate of their relationship remains uncertain, with fans clinging to hope for a possible reconciliation.

item.title: Kiara Advani hospitalised? Actor's team issues clarification after she misses Game Changer event in Mumbai - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Kiara Advani Hospitalised? Actor's Team Issues Clarification After Missing Game Changer Event

Date: Jan 04, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Kiara Advani was scheduled to appear at the trailer launch of her film Game Changer in Mumbai but missed the event, leading to speculation about her health.

  • Reports surfaced that Kiara Advani had been hospitalised, prompting her team to clarify that she is not hospitalized.
  • Her absence was attributed to exhaustion and a medical recommendation to rest.
  • The film Game Changer features Ram Charan and involves themes of politics and fair elections.
  • The film is set for release on January 10, 2025.
  • Kiara is married to actor Sidharth Malhotra since February 2023.
“Kiara has been advised to rest due to exertion, as she has been working nonstop.”

The situation highlights the importance of clear communication regarding celebrities' health amidst public speculation.

item.title: Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties' - Indian Startup News
item.description:
Ashneer Grover trademarks his name; Netizens say, 'Now Sony TV will have to pay royalties'

Publication Date: N/A Source: Indian Startup News

Former Shark Tank India judge Ashneer Grover has officially trademarked his name, allowing him to strengthen his brand identity and expand his commercial reach. This was confirmed by his trademark lawyer, who shared the details on LinkedIn.

Key Points

  • Ashneer Grover has trademarked his name under class 41 of the Trade Marks Act, 1999.
  • Celebrity trademarks are a complex issue in India.
  • Famous personalities like Alia Bhatt and SRK have successfully trademarked their names.
  • Netizens reacted humorously to the news, discussing implications and making jokes.

Notable Quotes

"After navigating legal landscapes, we achieved this significant milestone. This trademark not only strengthens their brand identity but also expands their commercial reach beyond entertainment." - Aditi Tuteja
"Now sony television have to pay royalties for using the name of ashneer sir and tagging him in YouTube videos for the views." - Netizen Reaction

Overall, Grover's trademark could set a precedent for celebrity branding in India, as reactions from the public highlight the evolving nature of intellectual property in entertainment.

item.description:

  • Kiran Abbavaram may replace Anand Deverakonda due to production delays.

item.title: Sonu Sood hasn’t eaten a roti in four years, reveals Salman Khan secretly spiked his drink once because he’s a teetotaler - The Indian Express
item.description:
Sonu Sood Reveals His Strict Diet and Salman Khan's Attempt to Get Him to Drink

Publication Date: October 2023

Source: The Indian Express

In a recent interview, Sonu Sood spoke about his strict vegetarian diet and shared an amusing incident involving Salman Khan trying to spike his drink.

  • Sonu Sood has not eaten chapatis lately and follows a very controlled diet.
  • He disclosed that he is a teetotaler and has never tasted alcohol.
  • Salman Khan once attempted to sneak alcohol into his Red Bull drink at a party.
  • Sonu described his daily meals, emphasizing his commitment to healthy eating.
“Salman bhai ko bada shauk rehta tha, kehte ki, ‘Ek kaam kar zara, Red Bull ke andar daal ke laa thodi’” - Sonu Sood

This light-hearted revelation showcases Sood's dedication to his fitness and dietary choices, while also highlighting the camaraderie in the Bollywood fraternity.

item.title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release, Tumbbad’s 1.65 Crores Are Safe! - Koimoi
item.description:
Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani Re-Release Box Office Day 1: Clocks 2nd Biggest Opening For A Bollywood Re-Release

Publication Date: Recent update | Source: Koimoi

Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani, starring Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone, has made a strong comeback with its re-release, achieving significant box office numbers in its opening.

  • The film recorded a net collection of 1.25 crore in India on its first day.
  • It has become the second-biggest opening for a Bollywood re-release, following Tumbbad which collected 1.65 crores.
  • Despite a limited release, the film received enthusiastic reception with many theatres reported to be almost full.
  • The film originally released in 2013 and has developed a cult following.
  • YJHD has a total box office collection now standing at 191.28 crore, needing only 8.72 crores to reach the 200 crore milestone.
“In the past, some re-releases started with significantly lower openings yet earned big over time.”

The success of the re-release indicates the lasting appeal of 'Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani' and suggests a promising road ahead as it continues to draw audiences.

item.title: Delhi High Court grants Mirchi interim relief in copyright suit over Kareena Kapoor talk show - Bar & Bench - Indian Legal News
item.description:
Delhi High Court Grants Mirchi Interim Relief in Copyright Suit Over Kareena Kapoor Talk Show

Published on: 04 Jan 2025, 5:45 am

The Delhi High Court recently granted interim relief to radio broadcaster Mirchi in a copyright suit filed against MissMalini over clips from the ‘What Women Want’ talk show hosted by Kareena Kapoor Khan.

  • Mirchi claims that MissMalini Entertainment violated a prior agreement by uploading clips without proper approval.
  • The clips in question had obscured the ‘Mirchi’ logo while adding MissMalini's branding.
  • The Court ordered the removal of these clips from YouTube and Instagram within 48 hours.
  • MEPL is restrained from using Mirchi's copyrighted material until the next hearing on May 13.
Justice Mini Pushkarna granted ex parte interim injunction in favor of Mirchi.

This ruling reinforces copyright protections in the media industry and emphasizes the importance of prior agreements in content distribution.

item.title: Govinda's wife Sunita Ahuja reacts to Varun Dhawan being compared to him: ‘Usko bhi bura lagta hoga' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sunita Ahuja Comments on Varun Dhawan's Comparisons to Govinda

Date: Jan 04, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sunita Ahuja, wife of the renowned actor Govinda, spoke out regarding the comparisons drawn between her husband and contemporary actor Varun Dhawan. She expressed confusion over the rationale behind such comparisons.

  • Sunita Ahuja shared her perspective on Varun Dhawan being compared to her husband, Govinda.
  • She commented that Varun might feel uncomfortable about the comparisons to both Govinda and Salman Khan.
  • Sunita acknowledged Varun's exposure to Govinda’s work from childhood, suggesting some resemblance might naturally occur.
  • Govinda was last seen in the 2019 film, 'Rangeela Raja', and has more projects lined up.
  • Varun Dhawan has multiple upcoming films, including 'Sunny Sanskari Ki Tulsi Kumari' and 'Border 2'.
“Bolte hain, compare karte hain, but kyun bolte hain mereko ye samajh me nahi aata hai.” - Sunita Ahuja

This commentary from Sunita reveals her feelings about the unnecessary comparisons that media and audiences often make between actors across generations.

item.title: Govinda’s wife Sunita Ahuja implies they live separately, isn’t sure if he’s cheating on her: ‘Khali baitha hai kuch kar na daale’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Govinda’s Wife Sunita Ahuja Discusses Their Marriage and Rumors

Publication Date: Not specified | Source: Indian Express

Sunita Ahuja recently opened up about her marriage to Govinda, highlighting their separate living arrangements and raising suspicions about his fidelity.

  • Sunita revealed they live in separate houses, with Govinda often spending time at his bungalow.
  • She mentioned that their relationship initiated by her, and reflected on Govinda's lack of romantic gestures.
  • After 37 years of marriage, Sunita expressed her worries regarding Govinda's potential affairs as he grows older.
  • Despite past affairs rumors during his peak career, Sunita is more cautious now that he is over 60.
“Khaali baitha hai kuch kar na daale” (he is sitting idle, what if he does something).

Although they have shared their lives together, Sunita's apprehensions about their future together illustrate the complexities of their long-term marriage.

item.title: Ranbir Kapoor Reveals Actor Fell In Love With Anushka Sharma But She Rejected Him: ‘Uska Surname Hai…’ | Vi - News18
item.description:
Ranbir Kapoor Reveals Actor Fell In Love With Anushka Sharma But She Rejected Him: ‘Uska Surname Hai…’

Date: January 04, 2025 | Source: Vi

Ranbir Kapoor and Anushka Sharma’s camaraderie was a highlight of the Ae Dil Hai Mushkil promotions. In a recent chat, Ranbir revealed that Anushka friend-zoned an actor who had feelings for her.

  • An actor friend of Anushka fell in love with her but was rejected.
  • Anushka explains her upbringing in an army household influenced her friendships.
  • Ranbir humorously noted that the actor's surname is also Kapoor.
Ranbir: “Agar yeh par ladkon ko samajh mein nahi aata hai. Accha, iske saath mujhe pata hai, jo acchi dosti dosti mein unko isse pyaar ho gaya hai...”

In personal news, Anushka married cricketer Virat Kohli in 2017 and they have two children. Ranbir is married to Alia Bhatt and they have a daughter.

Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas share their beautiful moments from their new year vacation, showcasing family time by the beach and adorable moments with their daughter Malti Marie.

item.title: WWE SmackDown Results – 1/3/25 (First 3-Hour Show, Women’s Title Match) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE SmackDown Results – January 3, 2025

Date & Source: January 3, 2025 - Wrestleview.com

The WWE SmackDown event at the Footprint Center in Phoenix commenced with notable segments including a much-anticipated Women's Title match.

  • Cody Rhodes kicked off the show, making a significant statement about upcoming matches.
  • Drew McIntyre interrupted, creating tension between him and Cody.
  • Shinsuke Nakamura defeated Andrade in an intense match.
  • Michin claimed victory over Piper Niven.
  • Nia Jax retained her title against Naomi, followed by Tiffany Stratton cashing in for a surprising win.
  • The Bloodline triumphed in a six-man tag match against The Usos and Sami Zayn.
"A very good match between Nia Jax and Naomi. The Tiffany Stratton cash in tease was massive and when she did cash in, it was huge." — Wrestleview.com

Overall, the show generated excitement and crucial developments as WWE transitions into a new era of programming.

item.title: Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 30: Allu Arjun’s blockbuster blazes past Rs 1800 cr mark, is Rs 270 crore shy of breaking Dangal’s record - The Indian Express
item.description:
Pushpa 2 worldwide box office collection day 30

Date: January 3, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Pushpa 2: The Rule continues its phenomenal run at the box office, becoming the fastest Indian film to surpass the Rs 1800 crore milestone.

  • The film achieved a nett collection of Rs 3.85 crore on day 30, a decrease from Rs 5 crore on day 29.
  • It has now grossed a total of Rs 1193.6 crore in its first month, showing resilience against other recent releases.
  • BookMyShow reported over 20 million tickets sold for Pushpa 2 on their platform.
  • Pushpa 2 is closing in on Aamir Khan's Dangal, which holds the record at Rs 2070 crore.
  • The producers celebrated the film's success on social media, emphasizing its cultural impact and box office dominance.
“Pushpa2TheRule is RULING THE INDIAN BOX OFFICE with its record-breaking run. The WILDFIRE BLOCKBUSTER GROSSES 1799 CRORES WORLDWIDE in 4 weeks.”

As the film enters its fifth week, audiences eagerly await to see if it can maintain its momentum and break more records.

item.title: 'Baby John' box office collection day 10: The Varun Dhawan starrer sees a major drop as it makes Rs 45 la - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Baby John box office collection day 10: Major drop for Varun Dhawan starrer

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Times of India

'Baby John', starring Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, and Wamiqa Gabbi, was released on December 25. Despite a decent opening of Rs 11.25 crore, the film has seen a significant decline in box office collections.

  • The film made Rs 45 lakh on its second Friday.
  • Total collection to date stands at Rs 36.85 crore.
  • It has lost around 2500 shows due to poor performance.
  • Projected lifetime collection in India may reach around Rs 40 crore.
  • Facing stiff competition from 'Pushpa 2', which is expected to surpass Rs 1200 crore.
  • 'Baby John' is considered to have underperformed against its high budget.
"The film continues to face a major competition from 'Pushpa 2'."

In conclusion, 'Baby John' has experienced a significant drop in box office performance, raising concerns about its viability in cinemas compared to other films.

item.title: 'Pushpa 2' box office collection day 30: The Allu Arjun starrer records its lowest number on fifth Friday - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Pushpa 2' Box Office Collection Day 30

Publication Date: Not provided | Source: Not provided

As 'Pushpa 2' enters its 30th day at the box office, it achieved its lowest collection on the fifth Friday while inching closer to a staggering Rs 1200 crore in India.

  • The film has been a major success since its release.
  • It faced a decline in earnings on its fifth Friday.
  • The total collection is nearing Rs 1200 crore, marking a significant milestone for the film.
"The record-breaking numbers indicate a strong audience connection."

This film's performance highlights the evolving landscape of Indian cinema and the growing trend of films crossing the Rs 1200 crore mark.

item.title: Sunita Ahuja reacts to Raveena Tandon claiming she'd have married Govinda had they met earlier: ‘Maine kaha le ja…’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sunita Ahuja Reacts to Raveena Tandon Claiming She'd Have Married Govinda Had They Met Earlier

Date: Jan 04, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Sunita Ahuja, wife of Govinda, discussed her husband's past relationships in a candid interview. She humorously responded to Raveena Tandon’s comment about marrying Govinda if they had met earlier.

  • Sunita Ahuja has been married to Govinda for nearly 40 years.
  • Raveena Tandon jokingly mentioned she would have married Govinda had they met sooner.
  • Sunita playfully encouraged Raveena to take Govinda to find out what he's like.
  • Raveena and Govinda starred in many films together during the 90s and 2000s.
  • Both Raveena and Shilpa Shetty visited Govinda during his hospital stay.
  • Sunita expressed humorously in the interview regarding her husband and the possibility of infidelity.
“Raveena still says, ‘Chi Chi, if I had met you earlier, I would have married you.’ I told her, ‘Take him, then you'll find out.’” - Sunita Ahuja

The playful banter and strong ties between Govinda, Sunita, and his former co-stars reflect the dynamics of their long careers in Bollywood.

item.title: 'Dabidi Dibidi' song from 'Daaku Maharaaj' faces backlash for inappropriate choreography and age gap - TOI Etimes
item.description:
'Dabidi Dibidi' Song from 'Daaku Maharaaj' Faces Backlash for Inappropriate Choreography and Age Gap

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: Times of India

The latest song titled 'Dabidi Dibidi' from the upcoming film 'Daaku Maharaaj' has sparked a wave of negative comments online due to its suggestive choreography and the significant age gap between the lead actors.

  • Nandamuri Balakrishna (64) and Urvashi Rautela (30) star in the music video.
  • Choreography includes controversial dance moves deemed inappropriate by viewers.
  • Social media backlash includes demands for the song to be reshot or removed.
  • Some users criticized the dynamics of the dance given the age difference.
  • The film is set for release on January 12, 2025.
“What on earth did I just watch? A grown man dancing so inappropriately with someone who could be his daughter?”

The backlash highlights ongoing discussions about age gaps and appropriateness in modern cinema.
